amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to award grants or provide funding for high-efficiency toilets or indoor water-efficient toilets.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to award grants or provide funding for high-efficiency toilets or indoor water-efficient toilets.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A075) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A075) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A075) offered by Mr. Gosar.
